meanings.definition: To forget or discard previously learned information or skills.
meanings.sent1: She unlearns the old dance moves and learns new ones.
meanings.sent2: He unlearns his fear of heights by facing it gradually.
meanings.sent3: The robot unlearns how to walk and starts dancing instead.
meanings.sent4: The student unlearns the wrong answer and discovers the correct one.
meanings.sent5: The athlete unlearns bad habits to improve performance.

meanings.definition: To reverse the process of learning something.
meanings.sent1: The magician unlearns the card trick to surprise the audience.
meanings.sent2: As she practices more, she unlearns her mistakes and gets better.
meanings.sent3: The chef unlearns the recipe and creates a new dish by accident.
meanings.sent4: The explorer unlearns the map and finds a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The scientist unlearns the hypothesis and discovers a new theory.
